Title: A Light of the Dark
Description:
The image of a purple candle, burning with glorious power springs unbidden to your mind as you contemplate the decaying filth before you, followed by a faint whisper echoing through your mind: "One candle to rule them all, and in its brightness bind them."

Bring Janky the candlesmith in Gundargaz enough Coagulated Black Blood to forge a most unfortunate candle.
ObjectivesText: Collect Coagulated Black Blood and bring it to Janky the kobold candlesmith in Gundargaz.
RewardText: Oh...Janky not normally turn down new candle, but you sure?
